description: Accessed via a narrow alleyway behind the beach, this restaurant housed in an old warehouse once used for smoking cured meats and drying Cilento figs boasts stone-vaulted ceilings, a romantic ambience and a small terrace embellished by beautiful plants. Chef Antoni Tafuri’s cuisine features on various tasting menus (including vegetarian and vegan) and an à la carte and demonstrates careful combinations that aim to showcase his regional ingredients to the full.
